新抗原疫苗会激发针对肾癌的强大免疫防御个性化的新抗原癌疫苗在肾细胞癌患者中产生强烈的免疫反应，导致持久的T细胞扩张，并且在40个月后无疾病复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/neoantigen-vaccine-sparks-powerful-mmmune-defense-defense-defense-gainst-kidney-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/neoantigen-vaccine-sparks-powerful-mmmune-defense-defense-fefense-gainst-kidney-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c721C46C-26B4-4-4EF7-9B01-D923DD4F5047 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 20:02:00 -0500 Neoantigen vaccine sparks powerful immune defense against kidney cancer

果蝇研究发现酒精引起的失眠背后的大脑信号影响超过10％的美国人的饮酒障碍可能导致持久而严重的失眠。入睡和入睡的困难即使经过几个月的清醒，也可以持续下去，从而增加复发的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/fruit-fly-research-uncovers-brain-signals-behind-behind-alchind-alcohol-tocus-indist-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/fruit-fly-research-uncovers-brain-signals-behind-behind-alchind-alcohol-incohol-tocus-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5de3d2fb-b3bf-472b-472b-8beb-ba4845dc527d Thu, 06 Feb 2025 13:53:36 -0500 Fruit fly research uncovers brain signals behind alcohol-induced insomnia

新研究确定了心力衰竭的潜在药物目标由于患者的高患病率和有限的治疗选择，心力衰竭仍然是重大负担。心力衰竭分为两种主要的临床亚型 - 心力衰竭，并保留了射血分数（HFPEF）和心力衰竭，并减少了射血分数（HFREF）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/new-study-indistifies-potential-drug-targets-for for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/new-study-indistifies-potential-drug-targets-for for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699d5edc-d096-43-43-9d6c-d6c-d68a040951b1 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 12:47:16 -0500 New study identifies potential drug targets for heart failure
